    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static CustomerInterface getInstance(RealBank thisBank)
        Singleton instance retriever.. ensures no two instances of customer interface exist at any one time.
        Parameters:
        thisBank - RealBank to pass to the CustomerInterface constructor
        Returns:
        SINGLETON_INSTANCE: if the current SINGLETON_INSTANCE is null, a new instance is constructed and returned. otherwise, this method will return the current instance.

      • START

        public void START()
        after the CustomerInterface is instantiated, the Start() function is called to load the realBank object from file and instantiate the Singleton

      • getCustomer

        public Customer getCustomer()
        returns the customer object of the customer currently logged in
        Returns:
        returns the UUID object of the customer currently logged in

      • setCustomer

        public void setCustomer(Customer newCustomer)
        updates the Customer object held by the customer interface
        Parameters:
        newCustomer - new customer to which this instance of the CustomerInterface belongs

      • setCustomerInterfaceState

        public void setCustomerInterfaceState(bank_interface.CustomerInterfaceState newCustomerInterfaceState)
        utilizing the State design pattern, this method updates the current Customer Interface state with the new state.
        Parameters:
        newCustomerInterfaceState - new state passed to Customer Interface

      • logOff

        public void logOff()
        called on current state of the customer interface disconnects the user from the user interface.

      • enterEmail

        public java.lang.String enterEmail(java.lang.String email)
        processes the user's ENTERED email
        Parameters:
        email - email entered by the user in the gui form, used to log the customer in.
        Returns:
        returns feedback to the user based on the outcome of the email processing

      • saveBankDataToFile

        public void saveBankDataToFile()
        calls on the bank proxy object to save all information to file through object output stream
